question: The Kanya Sumangala Yojana of the government of Uttar Pradesh can be availed by the girl child born after which date?
explanation: The Kanya Sumangala Yojana of the government of Uttar Pradesh can be availed by the girl child born after 1st April 2019. As per the scheme Rs. 15,000 will be provided to every family where a girl child is born.
